settings.title: Kuwait Visa Medical
settings.subtitle: Affordable and same day Kuwait embassy medicals. We are an authorised provider of embassy visa medicals.

settings.title: What Is a Kuwait embassy medical?
settings.text1:
The Kuwait embassy medical is a special type of medical examination that is required for visa applicants who wish to enter Kuwait. This examination must be conducted by a licensed physician and must be completed within two weeks prior to the applicant's scheduled date of travel.

The Kuwait embassy medical is not required for all visa applicants; however, it may be required for those who have certain medical conditions or who have been exposed to communicable diseases. In addition, the Kuwaiti government may require this exam for applicants who are planning to stay in Kuwait for an extended period of time.

The Kuwait embassy medical is a routine medical examination that is conducted to ensure the safety of Kuwaiti citizens.
settings.text2:
The examination includes a physical examination, blood tests, and X-rays. Applicants are also required to provide information about their travel plans, medical history, and any medications they are taking.

After the applicant has completed the Kuwait embassy medical, the results will be sent to the Kuwaiti government for review. If the applicant is approved, they will be issued a visa that allows them to enter Kuwait. If the applicant is not approved, they may be required to submit to another medical examination or may be denied entry into Kuwait altogether.

It is important to note that the Kuwait embassy medical is not a requirement for all visa applicants. However, it may be required for those who have certain medical conditions or who have been exposed to communicable diseases. In addition, the Kuwaiti government may require this exam for applicants who are planning to stay in Kuwait for an extended period of time.

settings.title: Authorised by embassies
settings.text: Welzo only works with verified doctors and clinics authorised by embassies such as Harley Medic International.

settings.title: Price matched
settings.text: We price match all of our visa medicals. This guarantees we are the most affordable on the market.

settings.title: Efficient and Fast
settings.text: We offer same day appointments and express results and certificate for visa issuance.

settings.title: We Are The UK's Leading Visa Medical Provider
Where can I book my visa medical?
settings.text: Booking a visa medical is a straightforward process. Simply head to the contact us page by clicking here. Once you complete the contact us form, we will get in touch with you via email within 30 minutes to organise your appointment.

settings.title: How much does a Kuwait embassy medical cost?
settings.text: We offer the most affordable visa medicals on the market. Prices usually start from as low as £49 all the way up to £250 depending on the requirements for your travel destination.

settings.title: How long does a Kuwait medical take?
settings.text: Depending on your travel destination, the condition for your visa medical will vary. However, the average appointment time is 30 minutes.

settings.title: Are these medicals authorised for work abroad?
settings.text: Yes we work with GMC registered doctors and all of them are registered with the FCO.

settings.title: What tests are carried out with the medical?
settings.text: The tests carried out depend on the country you are travelling to. Each country has its own set of testing requirements, but we are aware of the conditions and will make sure that they comply. These tests usually involve a consultation with our doctors to check your ear, sight, and chest, followed by blood work and potentially an x-ray.
